## Outcomes

- Our docs are **MUCH** more organized
- Better entrypoints for users--they know where to start!
- We spent **A LOT** of time arguing about what is a tutorial, what is a how-to guide
- The diátaxis framework is **VERY** nuanced--read the whole thing!
- Doing this in small chunks was **HARD**
- **Interested in the experiences of other projects--did this work for you?**
